name: PROGILINE® GEAR 220 PG
description: PROGILINE® Gear 220 PG is a range of polyalkylene glycol based synthetic extreme pressure gear lubricants, providing high levels of load carrying capacity and wear protection. The range is designed to enable continuous operation at high temperature, with minimized friction and good thermal / oxidative stability properties. PROGILINE® Gear PG lubricants allow thermally stable operation at temperatures exceeding 200°C, and offer anticipated service lifetimes of all grades in excess of 10,000 hours at 100°C, enabling extended service intervals and in some instances a fill-for-life lubricant.
